meanings.definition: Decorative ceramic tiles, typically blue and white, used in Spanish and Portuguese architecture.
meanings.sent1: The azulejos on the walls of the church were beautifully painted.
meanings.sent2: In Portugal, you can see azulejos decorating many buildings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the azulejos were magical portals.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a mosaic of memories, each piece a different azulejo.
meanings.sent5: The azulejos gleamed under the bright sun, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A type of tilework commonly found in Spain and Portugal.
meanings.sent1: The intricate azulejos in the palace depicted scenes from history.
meanings.sent2: Walking through the streets, you can't miss the vibrant azulejos adorning the buildings.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the azulejos were a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: His life was like a patchwork quilt, each experience a different azulejo.
meanings.sent5: The azulejos told stories of the past, whispering secrets to those who admired them.
